text: Review this code and improve readability.
This function is slow, find bottlenecks and optimize it.
Help me debug this error and trace what is going wrong.
Scan this code for high-risk security vulnerabilities and suggest fixes.
Generate API documentation in markdown with examples.
Create an OpenAPI (Swagger) spec with examples and auth schemes.
Create a changelog since the last release and highlight breaking changes.
Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD and deploy to Kubernetes with Helm.
Build a professional React dashboard with charts and filters.
Train an AutoML classifier optimized for F1 and export evaluation plots.
Do feature engineering and select the top features recursively.
